Package be.brahms.rent_serve.hateaos

Class CategoryAssembler

java.lang.Object
be.brahms.rent_serve.hateaos.CategoryAssembler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.hateoas.server.RepresentationModelAssembler<CategoryDto,org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<CategoryDto>>
@Component public class CategoryAssembler extends Object implements org.springframework.hateoas.server.RepresentationModelAssembler<CategoryDto,org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<CategoryDto>>
CategoryAssembler is a class that helps to convert CategoryDto objects into EntityModel objects. It creates models with links for category data.

This class uses a default constructor.

  • Method Details

    • toModel

      public org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<CategoryDto> toModel(CategoryDto category)
      Convert a CategoryDto to an EntityModel with HATEOAS links.

      This method adds useful links to the CategoryDto, a link for all categories or category by materials or services

      Specified by:
      toModel in interface org.springframework.hateoas.server.RepresentationModelAssembler<CategoryDto,org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<CategoryDto>>
      Parameters:
      category - the category data to wrap
      Returns:
      an EntityModel with the category data and HATEOAS links
